questions.question: Has he agreed to ………………….. the work?
questions.description: Do can mean execute or carry out.

questions.question: Have you ……………………….. what I told you?
questions.description: Do can mean finish or complete.

questions.question: The company …………………….. bicycles and tricycles.
questions.description: To make is to produce or manufacture.

questions.question: Will this tablecloth ……………………. or should I use another?
questions.description: Do can mean suffice or be good enough.

questions.question: He ……………………. a speech on the occasion.
questions.description: To make a speech is to deliver a speech.

questions.question: They …………………… the kitchen and the bathrooms every day.
questions.description: To do the kitchen is to clean it.

questions.question: I won’t go and you can’t ……………………… me.
questions.description: To make someone go is to compel them to go.

questions.question: Laws are …………………… to be obeyed.
questions.description: To make laws is to enact them.

questions.question: Last summer we ……………………. ten countries in one month.
questions.description: To do ten countries is to travel through ten countries.

questions.question: Hurry or we won’t …………………… the train.
questions.description: To make the train is to catch it.

questions.question: When buying a bag, look closely at its ....................................
